new.name: CVE-2021-32846
new.description: HyperKit is a toolkit for embedding hypervisor capabilities in an application. In versions 0.20210107, function `pci_vtsock_proc_tx` in `virtio-sock` can lead to to uninitialized memory use. In this situation, there is a check for the return value to be less or equal to `VTSOCK_MAXSEGS`, but that check is not sufficien CVE project by @Sn0wAlice

new.name: CVE-2021-32845
new.description: HyperKit is a toolkit for embedding hypervisor capabilities in an application. In versions 0.20210107 and prior of HyperKit, the implementation of `qnotify` at `pci_vtrnd_notify` fails to check the return value of `vq_getchain`. This leads to `struct iovec iov;` being uninitialized and used to read memory in `len = (in CVE project by @Sn0wAlice

new.name: CVE-2021-32844
new.description: HyperKit is a toolkit for embedding hypervisor capabilities in an application. In versions 0.20210107 and prior of HyperKit, ` vi_pci_write` has is a call to `vc_cfgwrite` that does not check for null which when called makes the host crash. This issue may lead to a guest crashing the host causing a denial of service. T CVE project by @Sn0wAlice

new.name: CVE-2021-32843
new.description: HyperKit is a toolkit for embedding hypervisor capabilities in an application. In versions 0.20210107 and prior of HyperKit, `virtio.c` has is a call to `vc_cfgread` that does not check for null which when called makes the host crash. This issue may lead to a guest crashing the host causing a denial of service. This is CVE project by @Sn0wAlice

new.name: CVE-2022-0492-Docker-Breakout-Checker-and-PoC
new.description: Docker Breakout Checker and PoC via CAP_SYS_ADMIN and via user namespaces (CVE-2022-0492)

new.name: CVE-2022-0492
new.description: A vulnerability was found in the Linux kernel’s cgroup_release_agent_write in the kernel/cgroup/cgroup-v1.c function. This flaw, under certain circumstances, allows the use of the cgroups v1 release_agent feature to escalate privileges and bypass the namespace isolation unexpectedly. CVE project by @Sn0wAlice

new.name: CVE-2023-0901
new.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor in GitHub repository pixelfed/pixelfed prior to 0.11.4. CVE project by @Sn0wAlice

new.name: CVE-2022-40348
new.description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Intern Record System version 1.0 in /intern/controller.php in 'name' and 'email' parameters, allows attackers to execute arbitrary code. CVE project by @Sn0wAlice

Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Help Technologies. Successful att CVE project by @Sn0wAlice
